2147482623
There is 1024 bytes in 1 KB
1024 - 2048 = -1024
-2147483648 + 2147483647 = -1

There is 1024 bytes in 1 KB
1024 - 2048 = -1024
-2147483648 + 2147483647 = -1
1024 == 1024
